segments.text: I see the woman standing there, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if she’s creating a perfect little bubble around herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then, I notice the water, gushing over the edge like a relentless tide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn’t she see it? The cabinet doors are getting soaked!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And what about the children? The boy is practically defying gravity on that wobbly stool!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races as I watch him stretch for the cookies with reckless abandon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, waiting with such eager anticipation on her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re both so unbothered by the risk they’re taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a mix of admiration and frustration watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen that should feel safe is anything but; it’s a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world through the window is so calm, yet inside is chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every second feels like a ticking clock waiting for something to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could shout out a warning, but I know it wouldn’t help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All I can do is stand here and witness this precarious moment unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
